featured.text: Very few people, no matter how intelligent or experienced, can 28 all the possibilities or outcomes of a policy or a course of action within just a short period of time.

other.text: Java developed tea cultivation earlier than India. (C) Tea plants can grow for only a short period of time.

definition.zh_def: 一段時間或一個階段，通常用於描述某種特定的情況或事件。
definition.en_def: A length of time or a specific stage, often used to describe a particular situation or event.
definition.example: The project will take a period of six months to complete.
